content:
TITLE: Configuring SIPBUK Environment Variables DESCRIPTION: Sample content for the .env file, including application name, URL, database connection, email settings, and encryption key. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # Nama Aplikasi APP_NAME=SIPBUK # URL Aplikasi untuk development dan production APP_URL=http://localhost:3000 # Database URL jika menggunakan MySQL secara online DATABASE_URL=mysql://username:password@host:port/database_name?sslaccept=mode # Akun Google Untuk Pengiriman Email NODEMAILER_SERVICE=gmail NODEMAILER_USER=name@domain.com NODEMAILER_PASS=kata_sandi # Secret Key untuk enkripsi data dapat diisi dengan string random AES_KEY=secret_key ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloning SIPBUK Repository DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the SIPBUK repository from GitHub using Git. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git clone https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk.git ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Database Tables with Prisma DESCRIPTION: Command to create database tables using Prisma schema. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run db:push ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing SIPBUK Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Command to install all necessary dependencies for the SIPBUK application using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Seeding Knowledge Base Data DESCRIPTION: Command to seed the knowledge base data into the database. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run db:seed ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Default SIPBUK Account Credentials DESCRIPTION: Default user and admin account credentials for accessing the SIPBUK application. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # Akun Pengguna Email: user@sipbuk.com Password: user123 # Akun Admin Email: admin@sipbuk.com Password: admin123 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running SIPBUK Application in Development Mode DESCRIPTION: Command to start the SIPBUK application in development mode. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Navigating to SIPBUK Directory DESCRIPTION: Command to change the current directory to the cloned SIPBUK folder. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` cd sipbuk ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Alternative Command for Creating Database Tables DESCRIPTION: Alternative command to create database tables using Prisma CLI directly. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx prisma db push ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Alternative Command for Seeding Knowledge Base DESCRIPTION: Alternative command to seed the knowledge base data using Prisma CLI directly. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx prisma db seed ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing SIPBUK Application DESCRIPTION: URL to access the SIPBUK application in a web browser after starting the development server. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/installation-guide.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` http://localhost:3000 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Navigation Cards for Symptom Management in Next.js DESCRIPTION: This snippet implements a card-based navigation interface for symptom management using the Nextra theme's Card component with React Icons integration. It provides links to add, edit, and delete symptom data pages for admin users. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/admin-guide/symptom-management.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
} title="Tambah Data Gejala" href="/docs/admin-guide/symptom-management/add" arrow={true} /> {" "} } title="Ubah Data Gejala" href="/docs/admin-guide/symptom-management/edit" arrow={true} /> } title="Hapus Data Gejala" href="/docs/admin-guide/symptom-management/delete" arrow={true} />
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Next.js Image Component and Asset for Pest Management Documentation DESCRIPTION: This code imports the Next.js Image component and a specific image asset for documentation purposes. The image shows the interface for setting rules for pest and disease management in the SIPBUK application. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/admin-guide/pest-and-disease-management/set-rule.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import Image from "next/image"; import setRulePestOrDesease from "@/assets/docs/ag-pest-and-desease-management-set-rule.png"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Image Components for Documentation in Next.js DESCRIPTION: This code imports the Image component from Next.js and a specific image asset showing the deletion interface for pest and disease management. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/admin-guide/pest-and-disease-management/delete.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import Image from "next/image"; import deletePestOrDesease from "@/assets/docs/ag-pest-and-desease-management-delete.png"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering Image Component in Markdown Documentation DESCRIPTION: This code block shows how to render a Next.js Image component within a Markdown document. The image displays the interface for setting pest/disease rules with proper styling, dimensions, and accessibility attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/admin-guide/pest-and-disease-management/set-rule.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Documentation Image with Next.js Image Component DESCRIPTION: This JSX snippet demonstrates how to display an image within the documentation using Next.js Image component with appropriate styling and properties. SOURCE: https://github.com/deri-kurniawan/sipbuk/blob/main/pages/docs/admin-guide/pest-and-disease-management/delete.mdx#2025-04-20_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` ```
